title: CustomConnectedBlockTemplateAsset
description: Defines custom connection rules for blocks that connect to adjacent blocks. This asset type allows blocks to change their visual appearance or shape based on neighboring blocks.

DontUpdateAfterInitialPlacement.description: Default to false. When true, will not update the connected block after initial placement. Neighboring block updates won't affect this block when true.

ConnectsToOtherMaterials.description: Defaults to true. If true, the material will connect to other materials of different block type sets, if false, the material will only connect to its own block types within the material

DefaultShape.description: The default shape to use when no patterns match

Shapes.description: Map of shape names to their pattern matching rules. Each shape defines patterns that determine when it should be used and face tags for the shape.

ConnectedBlockFaceTags.description: Tags assigned to each face of the block. Used for pattern matching between connected blocks.

AllowedPatternTransformations.description: Allowed transformations when matching this pattern

IsCardinallyRotatable.description: Whether the pattern can be rotated in 90-degree increments

MirrorX.description: Whether the pattern can be mirrored on the X axis

MirrorZ.description: Whether the pattern can be mirrored on the Z axis

RuleToMatch.description: A rule for matching neighboring blocks

Position.description: Relative position of the neighbor to check

IncludeOrExclude.description: Whether matching blocks should be included or excluded

BlockTypeLists.description: Block type lists to match against

FaceTags.description: Face tags the neighbor must have

CustomTemplateConnectedBlockPattern.description: A pattern to match for selecting this shape. Must have a Type field that identifies the pattern implementation.

TransformRulesToOrientation.description: Whether to transform rules based on block orientation

YawToApplyAddReplacedBlockType.description: Yaw rotation to apply when replacing block type

RequireFaceTagsMatchingRoll.description: Whether face tags must match the roll orientation

RulesToMatch.description: Rules that must be satisfied for this pattern to match

OnlyOnPlacement.description: Only evaluate this pattern when the block is first placed

OnlyOnUpdate.description: Only evaluate this pattern when neighboring blocks change

ConnectedBlockShape.description: A shape definition with patterns and face tags. Defines when a particular block shape should be used based on neighboring blocks.

PatternsToMatchAnyOf.description: Patterns to match - shape is used if any pattern matches

FaceTags.description: Tags for each face when this shape is active
